title: This Keeps Happening Can Someone Help?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I tried running it as an administrator, then I restarted my PC, and I tried reinstalling it but nothing worked can someone help?

replies.body:
Running as admin is a good start, there may be a security setting blocking your game files from being accessed or downloading correctly.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help make sure League is being added as an exception.

You might have to reinstall your game as well to make sure everything is installing properly.  You can do that buy downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), making sure your League folder is removed, then moving forward with the reinstall.
Thanks I fixed it because of you thank you.
